subject: Pro X Ultra lights don't go out
description_text:
The lights on the pedals and baseplate do not turn off when pc is powered
off.  I've checked my bios and no power is going to usb ports, even
unplugging usb they stay on. Is this supposed to happen, or do I need to
turn off the lights from the app before shutting down.

Thank you,
Michael

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Beers,  Many modern motherboards continue to supply power to the USB ports even after the computer is shut down. As a result, the pedals remain powered on, and since the pedals cannot detect whether the computer is turned off, they will continue to operate. To completely power off the pedals, you need to turn off the power at the computer’s wall outlet or power strip switch.
